===Overview===
The '''United States Air Force''' ('''U.S.A.F.''') is the aerial and space warfare service branch of the [[United States Armed Forces (Earth-616)|United States Armed Forces]]. It is one of the five branches of the United States Armed Forces, and one of the seven uniformed services of the [[United States of America]]. It is the largest and most technologically advanced air force on the planet [[Earth]]. 

===[[World War I]]===
It was formed as a separate branch of the military in 1947, but its history started much earlier, as a part of the [[United States Army (Earth-616)|U.S. Army]]. The first aerial combat force was created during [[World War I]] and it was very efficient for covering infantry and tanks.{{Citation}} 

===[[World War II]]===
During the [[World War II]] it attacked [[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Nazi]] and [[Imperial Japan (Earth-616)|Japanese]] bases and some squadrons were led by [[Jim Hammond (Earth-616)|Human Torch]] and the rest of the [[Invaders (WWII) (Earth-616)|Invaders]].{{Citation}} One USAF bomber, the Enola Gay, dropped the first atomic bomb on the [[Japan|Japanese]] city [[Hiroshima]], and then another one on [[Nagasaki]].{{Citation}}

===[[Cold War (Event)|Cold War]]===
After World War II, the United States and the [[Soviet Union]] directly threatened each other with nuclear weapons. This period of time is referred to as The Cold War. The countries never actually fought but did fund and support wars over a 40 year period.

In 1947, US Air Force pilot; [[Charles Yeager (Earth-616)|Chuck Yeager]] he became the first pilot confirmed to have exceeded the speed of sound in level flight in the Bell X-1.{{r|Agents of Atlas Vol 2 2}} Chuck later took [[Kenneth Hale (Earth-616)|Gorilla Man]] up for a joy ride in the [[Bell X-1]].{{r|Agents of Atlas Vol 2 2}} 

====[[Roswell UFO Incident]]====
In 1947, when a United States Air Force surveillance balloon crashed at a ranch near [[Roswell]], [[New Mexico (State)|New Mexico]], prompting claims alleging the crash was of an extraterrestrial spaceship. It is believed that the shipped contained the [[Skrulls|aliens]] and was taken to a secret military base called [[Area 51]] in [[Nevada (State)|Nevada]].{{r|Blackwulf #2}}{{r|Marvel: The Lost Generation #4}}

====[[Korean War]]====
In 1950, the Korean War began. When [[North Korea]] invaded [[South Korea]] following a series of clashes along the border. The United States as the principal force, came to the aid of South.{{r|Combat Kelly Vol 1 1}}

====[[Vietnam War]]==== 
The Vietnam War lasted from 1954 to 1975 They also participated during the [[Vietnam War]], sending thousands of helicopters and many bombers which smashed many enemy villages. In 1973 [[North Vietnam]] and [[South Vietnam]] continue fighting but without significant U.S. involvement. It ended with communist victory in 1975 with the fall of [[Ho Chi Minh City|Saigon]] (later renamed Ho Chi Minh City).{{r|Captain America: Theatre of War - Ghosts of My Country Vol 1 1}}

===[[Gulf War]]===
In 1991, The [[Gulf War]] is waged in the [[Middle East]], by a [[United Nations (Earth-616)|U.N.]]-authorized coalition force from thirty-four nations, led by the US and [[United Kingdom]], against [[Saddam Hussein (Earth-616)|Saddam Hussein]]'s [[Iraqi]] forces.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 387}}

===[[Iraq War]]===
United States President [[George W. Bush (Earth-616)|George W. Bush]] declared a "War on Terror" which also saw the US Army invade Iraq and oust their leader [[Saddam Hussein (Earth-616)|Saddam Hussein]], beginning the [[Iraq War]]. 

===[[War in Afghanistan]]===
At the same time they also invaded [[Afghanistan]], beginning the [[War in Afghanistan]]. This led to American forces installing a new government and attempting to stabilize the region, while clashing with the forces of the terrorist organizations [[Al-Qaeda (Earth-616)|Al-Qaeda]] and the [[Taliban]].

===Modern Age===
[[Carol Danvers (Earth-616)|Carol Danvers]] joined the airforce and rose to the top of her Air Force class, taking the call sign "Cheeseburger". While flying an experimental jet through Arabic air space, however, Carol was shot down and captured by a man named [[Ghazi Rashid (Earth-616)|Ghazi Rashid]], who tortured her for several days. She managed to escape (despite a broken leg and serious injuries), reach a CIA safe-house in the area, and provide key information to the intelligence community.{{r|Ms. Marvel Vol 2 #32|33}}


[[Michael Rossi (Earth-616)|Colonel Michael Rossi]] later recruited her to join Airforce intelligence and they worked on the Rashid case together.{{r|Ms. Marvel Vol 2 33}} The two's first mission together was to Berlin it was on this mission she began calling him "Ace". They travelled there to find Vitamin but he was able to escape. The two began a romantic relationship after that. But after a couple of years it came to and end.{{r|Uncanny X-Men Vol 1 182}} Carol accomplished many different missions and worked with other figures such as [[Nicholas Fury (Earth-616)|Col. Nick Fury]], Logan (later [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]]) and Benjamin Grimm (later the [[Benjamin Grimm (Earth-616)|Thing]]), while opposing others such as Victor Creed (later [[Victor Creed (Earth-616)|Sabretooth]]), and Natalia Shostakova (later the [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Black Widow]]).{{r|Before the Fantastic Four: Ben Grimm and Logan #1|3}}{{r|Logan: Shadow Society #1}}
